snippet.title: Project Code Kaleido Tower Nintendo Switch™ Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the reveal trailer for the Nintendo Switch™ Digital Software
Project Code Kaleido Tower!

"Turn it all into a beautiful display. Your folly, your weakness, your shame... Your corpse."

◆Summary◆
Youths with unique abilities living under oppression enter a tower submerged in an endless dream. There, they will delve into themselves, their friends, and the people they love.


◆2023 Announcement Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/newtitle2023/english/

◆X（Twitter）◆
https://adag.jp/Voltage_Switch_X/

◆Official Portal Site◆
https://products.voltage.co.jp/switch/english/

◆Participating Creators◆
Director/Scenario: Ayane Ushio
Illustrator: Tana Khaki
Costume Design: UNICO INC.
Backgrounds: Shizui fen
BGM: Hayato Asano
Theme: DUSTCELL

※"Project Code Kaleido Tower" is the name of the project and not the official title of the game.
